title: Antiquarian's Attic
description: A Farrago of Antiquities routed out of the Rusts and Crusts and Fusts of Time!

title: ART and ARCHITECTURE, mainly
description: History, art history and architecture of Britain & Empire, Europe, Mediterranean & North America, 1640-1940.

title: Beachcombing's Bizarre History Blog
description: The outlandish, the anomalous and the curious from the last five thousand years.

title: Beth's Bobbins
description: Living history and historic costuming, with a particular focus on women's clothing and hairstyles of the Victorian and American Civil War periods.

title: A Blast From The Past
description: Oddities, striking characters and incidents, strange days... this is history with all the interesting bits left in, by the author of Batavia's Graveyard, Tulipomania and The First Family.

title: The British Newspaper Archive Blog
description: Amazing finds and news from over 300 years of historical newspapers.

title: A Collection of Unmitigated Pedantry
description: A look at history and popular culture.

title: The Diary of Samuel Pepys
description: Daily entries from the 17th century London diary.

title: distillatio
description: Medieval alchemy, chemistry related technology and random things distilled from books and artefacts.

title: Dr Alun Withey
description: I am an academic historian of medicine and the body,  and 2014 AHRC/BBC 'New Generation Thinker'.

title: Erik Kwakkel
description: Medieval book historian at The University of British Columbia, Vancouver. I post images of medieval books.
